## Rule.Output interface

Output

Signature:

```typescript
export interface Output extends Partial<{
    test: RegExp;
    use?: {
        loader: string;
        options?: {
            [key: string]: any;
        };
    }[];
    exclude?: RegExp;
    type?: string;
    parser?: Parser;
    generator?: any;
}>
```

Extends: Partial&lt;{ test: RegExp; use?: { loader: string; options?: { \[key: string\]: any; }; }\[\]; exclude?: RegExp; type?: string; parser?: Parser; generator?: any; }&gt;
